protein.specific_function: 6-O-sulfation enzyme which catalyzes the transfer of sulfate from 3'-phosphoadenosine 5'-phosphosulfate (PAPS) to position 6 of the N-sulfoglucosamine residue (GlcNS) of heparan sulfate.

go_class.description: heparan sulfate proteoglycan biosynthetic process, enzymatic modification

reference.reference_text: Habuchi H, Kobayashi M, Kimata K: Molecular characterization and expression of heparan-sulfate 6-sulfotransferase. Complete cDNA cloning in human and partial cloning in Chinese hamster ovary cells. J Biol Chem. 1998 Apr 10;273(15):9208-13.
